headline: Mantle Ridge Issues Shareholder Letter: Restoring Integrity is Necessary for Air Products and Chemicals, Inc. to Recover and Return to Prosperity
summary: Mantle Ridge LP, which, together with its affiliates (collectively, "Mantle Ridge"), beneficially owns approximately $1.3 billion of the outstanding common shares of Air Products and Chemicals, Inc.
